str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
